articles.title: Sources: Warriors' Durant to ink one-and-one deal
articles.description: Two-time NBA Finals MVP Kevin Durant intends to sign a new deal with the Warriors that includes a player option, league sources told ESPN.

articles.author: Kate King
articles.title: New Jersey Governor, Lawmakers Reach Budget Deal, Avoid Shutdown
articles.description: New Jersey Gov. Phil Murphy and state lawmakers reached a budget deal hours before their midnight deadline, averting a government shutdown with an agreement that will raise taxes on the stateâ€™s multi-millionaires and businesses.
